name: SMARTPRO FOUNDATION
briefDescription: A movement, a concept conceived and pioneered by Lieutenant Colonel Sanjay Sehgal and given a fillip by Nayantara, Rajal and their team.  A perfect blend of experience, youthful vigour and fresh ideas, Dynamic presence in the Disaster Management, Safety Management and Waste Management sectors.A pioneer in Community Capacity Building regarding the above to prepare a Disaster Resilient Community.Based at New Delhi and having its network spread across the places of activity.
